data.actual_result: The button says 'Connect to Spotify' as if you've never connected your account before
data.expected_result: The button should say 'Play on Spotify' if you have your Spotify account already connected
data.short_description: In the Overlay, when viewing someone with a Spotify status' miniprofile, it says 'Connect Spotify'
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a Spotify account connected to your Discord account - Start a game with Overlay - Start the overlay - Get someone with an active Spotify RP status - Open their miniprofile
